Author: tigerchik
Text: first paragraph - sounds like anxiety. There's a lot of research that eds are anxiety-related, as much as they might be "musT BE tHiN". Anxiety is mentally exhausting and that's probably contributing to your exhaustion. Aside from that, if your body is that underweight then it is probably just trying to hoard energy. It's not laziness - it's an illness, and a physiological response. Like a bear hibernating to conserve energy. I don't have any solutions for you except to keep trying to gain (the fatigue should dissipate), and maybe see an MD and get bloodwork done? Maybe an iron deficiency, or other deficiencies, are making you exhausted? keep us updated.
